title: Fiat 500 Hybrid Makes the Nissan Kicks Look Like a Rocket
description: The Fiat 500 Hybrid is officially back in the brand’s lineup, and production has already started at the Mirafiori plant in Turin. Offered in Hatchback, 3+1, and Cabrio body styles, it arrives in Pop, Icon, and La Prima trims, plus the Torino launch edition that nods to the model’s birthplace. ...
titleSummary: Hybrid Hot Seat: Fiat 500 Leaves Nissan Kicks in Dust
descriptionSummary: The Fiat 500 Hybrid has returned to the market with a bang, kicking off production at Turin's Mirafiori plant. It comes in three bodystyles - hatchback, coupe-like 3+1, and convertible cabriolet - in four distinct trim levels: Pop, Icon, La Prima, and a special Torino launch edition that pays homage to its Italian heritage.

title: Ford Still Makes a Sedan — And There's No Chance of It Coming to the US
description: We get it – crossovers, SUVs, and pickups sell, and sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons aren't as profitable anymore. Ford took that to heart in 2018 by saying it would be axing its lower-riding vehicles that aren't badged as Mustangs. We can only imagine the riot if Ford even hinted at killing off ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Only Remaining Rear-Wheel Drive Beauty Heads Abroad, Not Stateside"
descriptionSummary: As sales of crossovers, SUVs, and pickups continue to soar, many automakers are rethinking their sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons. Ford's 2018 pivot marked a turning point, with lower-riding models meeting the axe. The backlash against such a move would likely be fierce.

title: Nissan Pathfinder Could Return to Its Roots as a Body-on-Frame SUV
description: The Nissan Pathfinder has never stayed in one lane for long. Its earliest versions were unapologetically truck-like, built on the same bones as Nissan's Hardbody pickup and aimed squarely at drivers who actually needed ground clearance and a proper frame. That formula carried the model through much ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's Off-Road Heritage Revival: A Possible Return to Body-On-Frame Excellence"
descriptionSummary: From rugged off-road rigs to sleek family haulers, the Nissan Pathfinder has consistently defied categorization throughout its history, evolving from a utilitarian truck-based design to a more refined, versatile vehicle.

title: Software Error Triggers Recall of Nearly 230,000 Ford Bronco SUVs
description: Although the Bronco and Bronco Sport are incredibly successful models in Ford’s lineup, they are not without their problems. While one-off software glitches are fairly common these days, Blue Oval’s latest recall addresses something far more widespread. 229,609 vehicles, including 101,002 examples ...
titleSummary: Ford Recalls Thousands of Broncos Amid Glitch That Imperils Vehicle Safety.
descriptionSummary: Ford's highly popular Bronco and Bronco Sport have experienced issues beyond minor software hiccups, prompting a large-scale recall that affects nearly a quarter million units, with over 100,000 of those being the sport variant.

title: Nissan Xterra Will Be "Fun, Simple, and Capable" — Priced Under $40,000
description: The Xterra was once Nissan's straight-cut rival to the Toyota 4Runner – compact enough to maneuver, rugged enough for trails, and stripped of anything unnecessary. It survived for two generations until its eventual discontinuation in 2015. However, it's become increasingly clear Nissan intends to ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's Revamped Xterra Packs a Punch in an Affordable Package"
descriptionSummary: Nissan's Xterra was a trailblazing SUV that effortlessly balanced agility with off-road prowess, jettisoning frills for functional simplicity. After a successful run spanning two generations, it ceased production in 2015. Recent hints suggest its spirit may live on.

title: These Luxury Brands Came Out On Top Of Sales Satisfaction
description: Every year, J.D. Power sends out tens of thousands of surveys to people who buy or lease a new car. Questions focus on the delivery process and dealership particulars, like sales staff and website interactions. Near the end of the year, J.D. Power then assembles a list of the automakers that top ...
titleSummary: High-End Favorites Dominate Consumer Reports of Customer Satisfaction Surveys
descriptionSummary: J.D. Power conducts an annual survey of thousands of new vehicle owners, gathering feedback on purchase experiences including dealership interactions, website engagement, and delivery processes. The resulting rankings highlight the top-performing automakers.

title: The 2026 Genesis G70 Gets a Graphite Edition With Lowered Suspension
description: Believe it or not, the Genesis G70 has been around since 2017. It came to the US in 2018 with the BMW 3 Series, Lexus IS, and Cadillac CT4 right in its crosshairs. It was crowned North American Car of the Year in 2019, and has been a relatively decent seller since despite its advancing years. The ...
titleSummary: "Genesis Spices Up G70 Lineup with Sporty New Graphite Trim Level"
descriptionSummary: The Genesis G70 has been on the market for over five years, initially targeting the likes of BMW's 3 Series and Lexus' IS with its 2018 US debut. Now, at an age where many rivals have evolved, it remains a steady seller.

title: Third Fire at Key Supplier Threatens Ford’s F-150 and SUV Production
description: A four-alarm fire broke out Thursday morning at the Novelis aluminum plant in Scriba, New York, marking the third major incident at the site within two months and creating a fresh setback for Ford’s already fragile supply chain. The Oswego County facility supplies 40% of ...
titleSummary: Blaze Hits Critical Component Plant, Imperiling Ford's Best-Selling Lineup
descriptionSummary: A devastating four-alarm fire erupted at the Novelis aluminum plant in Scriba, New York on Thursday morning, adding to the facility's recent string of incidents and further straining Ford's already precarious supply chain operations.

title: Rare 1989 Lamborghini Countach 25th Anniversary For Sale With 7,000 Miles Is A Collector's Dream
description: A 1989 Lamborghini Countach 25th Anniversary, one of the highly sought-after Euro-market downdraft cars, has appeared on Bring a Trailer with a current bid of $375,000. Finished in Rosso Siviglia over Panna leather, this example is chassis KLA12728 and shows ...
titleSummary: "Million-Dollar Marvel: 1989 Lamborghini Countach for Sale with Impeccable Low-Mileage Provenance"
descriptionSummary: A rare 1989 Lamborghini Countach 25th Anniversary edition has landed on Bring a Trailer with a starting bid of $375,000. This highly sought-after Euro-market model boasts a stunning Rosso Siviglia exterior and Panna leather interior.

title: Lincoln Turns the Northern Lights Into a Luxury Interior
description: Paying homage to the cool, shifting hues of the Northern Lights, Lincoln’s Aurora theme is the newest among the brand’s exclusive Black Label color and trim packages. Ford’s luxury marque offers various interior themes across the Navigator, Nautilus, and Aviator models, each with its own bespoke ...
titleSummary: "Northern Exposure Gets a High-End Glow-Up at Historic Nebraska Mansion"
descriptionSummary: Inspired by the ethereal beauty of the Northern Lights, Lincoln's new Aurora package brings a captivating, shifting palette to its exclusive Black Label lineup. This unique theme is available on select Navigator, Nautilus, and Aviator models.

title: Uruguay Switched to EVs When Gas Hit $7, Would Americans Do the Same?
description: Uruguay has become an unlikely electric vehicle success story, with EVs now representing about 25% of all new vehicle sales, doubling their market share from last year. The reason? Gasoline now costs around $7.40 per gallon at the pump, making it one of the most expensive places in the world to ...
titleSummary: Uruguay's Electric Vehicle Shift: Can Rising Fuel Prices Trigger a US Revolution?
descriptionSummary: Uruguay has emerged as a surprising leader in electric vehicle adoption, with nearly a quarter of new car sales going to EVs - more than double last year's figure. Gas prices have skyrocketed, hitting over $7 per gallon locally.

title: Mercedes-AMG’s Most Controversial C63 Could Be Gone Sooner Than Expected
description: The controversial four-cylinder Mercedes-AMG C63 S E Performance is reportedly nearing the end of its lifecycle, following a leaked internal memo that surfaced through Germany’s Elektroauto News. According to the outlet, Mercedes is preparing to phase out the four-cylinder C63 and ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes' Hottest Rebel May Get the Axe Ahead of Schedule"
descriptionSummary: Sources close to Mercedes suggest that production of their polarizing four-cylinder C63 S E Performance model may soon come to an end, as the company reportedly prepares a major overhaul of its performance lineup.

title: 2027 Chevy Bolt With Super Cruise Hands-Free System Isn’t So Cheap Anymore
description: Deliveries of the 2027 Chevrolet Bolt will begin early next year, when it will officially be the cheapest EV in the country. Excluding the destination fee, the Bolt will start at $28,595, undercutting the new Nissan Leaf and Chevy’s own Equinox EV. Despite its low price, the Bolt will be available ...
titleSummary: "Bolt Prices Surge: GM Tacks on Cost for Chevy's High-Tech Ride"
descriptionSummary: The 2027 Chevrolet Bolt is set to debut as the most affordable electric vehicle in the US market next year, priced from $28,595 excluding destination fees. This budget-friendly option beats out rivals like the Nissan Leaf and Chevy's Equinox EV.

descriptionSummary: The finalists for the 2026 North American Car of the Year award have been unveiled, showcasing an incredibly diverse group of contenders. Among them is the highly anticipated Honda Prelude hybrid coupe, a sporty newcomer that's generated significant buzz since its debut in 2025.

title: Hyundai’s 641-HP Ioniq 6 N Is Finally Coming to America — And It’s a Serious Model 3 Performance Threat
description: Hyundai has officially unveiled the Ioniq 6 N at AutoMobility LA, confirming the long-anticipated arrival of its high-performance, Tesla 3 Performance rivaling, electric sedan to North America. After months of teasers and global previews, the 641-horsepower EV will reach the U.S. in limited numbers ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai has taken the wraps off the Ioniq 6 N at AutoMobility LA, bringing its highly anticipated high-performance electric sedan to North American shores. This potent model boasts 641 horsepower and arrives stateside in a carefully curated initial rollout.

title: Kia Recalls Over 250,000 Sedans For Fire Risk From Melting Gas Tanks
description: Kia has recalled 250,547 sedans for a rather concerning issue that could result in a melting, leaking gas tank, creating a fire risk. The issue relates specifically to the K5 midsize sedan, one of the sportier offerings in the segment. This is not the only fire-related hazard for Kia this year, as ...

descriptionSummary: Kia has issued a safety alert for 250,547 sedans, citing a potential flaw that could cause the gas tank to overheat and leak fuel, posing a significant fire risk primarily affecting the sporty K5 midsize model.

title: Jeep’s New Military-Inspired Gladiator Goes to War With Tacoma
description: It’s been rather troubling times for Jeep’s midsize pickup, the Gladiator. Despite significant discounts, sales have declined over the last two or so years, while the planned Gladiator hybrid was scrapped before it even reached the market.  But Jeep is forging ahead with a few improvements to ...
titleSummary: "Gladiator Takes Aim at Toyota's Tacominion in Battle of the Off-Road Titans"
descriptionSummary: Jeep's midsize pickup, the Gladiator, has faced a rough patch in recent years. Despite aggressive pricing and promotions, sales have plateaued, and a highly anticipated hybrid model was shelved just before its release. New upgrades are now on the horizon for the struggling truck.

title: 2026 Audi Q3 Arrives $4,000 Pricier—Should You Get a 2025 Model Instead?
description: Audi already revealed the new-generation Q3 in Europe earlier this year, signaling a shift in styling, tech, and performance for its smallest SUV. The U.S. version now arrives for the 2026 model year, and it carries nearly all the same upgrades. The catch is simple: it's pricier. The outgoing 2025 ...
titleSummary: "New Audi Q3 Hits Market at a Higher Price Tag: Is an Older Model the Better Buy?"
descriptionSummary: The latest Audi Q3 has been unveiled in Europe with a bold new design, cutting-edge technology, and enhanced performance capabilities. As it makes its US debut for the 2026 model year, enthusiasts can expect a price tag to match its upgraded features.

title: Volkswagen Restores Miracle T2 Bus That Survived California Wildfires
description: The Palisades fire that ripped through Los Angeles earlier this year was one of the most destructive in history, as thousands of homes were destroyed. But in a Malibu neighborhood, a classic T2 Volkswagen Bus defied the odds by somehow surviving the blaze largely intact, despite all the structures ...
titleSummary: "California's Lucky T2 Bus Emerges from Inferno with Thanks to VW Crew"
descriptionSummary: In the wake of the devastating Palisades fire, a vintage Volkswagen bus emerged unscathed from the ashes, its resilience a rare bright spot amidst the destruction that ravaged thousands of homes in Los Angeles earlier this year.

title: Meet the GV60 Magma: Genesis’ First Real AMG and M Rival
description: Genesis has been laying the groundwork for its Magma sub-brand for more than a year, positioning it as the performance arm that finally puts the company in the same conversation as BMW M and Mercedes-AMG. While Hyundai N handles the more playful, track-leaning end of the spectrum with its brilliant ...

descriptionSummary: Genesis is poised to shake up the high-performance market with its Magma sub-brand, a bold new direction aimed at rivaling top-tier players like BMW M and Mercedes-AMG. Building on a year-long foundation, Magma promises thrilling performance and prestige credentials.

description: In a statement released on November 18, the U.S. Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation has invited Ford CEO Jim Farley, General Motors CEO Mary Barra, and Stellantis CEO Antonio Filosa to publicly testify before Congress in a hearing scheduled for January 14, marking the first ...

descriptionSummary: The US Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation has summoned top executives from the Big Three automakers - Ford's Jim Farley, General Motors' Mary Barra, and Stellantis' Antonio Filosa - to testify before Congress next month.

title: 2026 Porsche Cayenne Turbo EV: Exclusive First Look at the Most Powerful Production Porsche Ever
description: The Porsche Cayenne Electric kicks off a new era for the brand. It’s Porsche’s first fully electric SUV, and it’s not shy about showing what the company can do with EV tech. With up to 850 kW (1,139 hp), a 0-60 mph time of 2.4 seconds, and up to 400 kW charging capability, this is not just the most ...

descriptionSummary: The Porsche Cayenne Electric marks a pivotal moment for the brand, introducing its first fully electric SUV with impressive performance credentials: 1,139 horsepower, 2.4-second 0-60 mph acceleration, and rapid 400 kW charging.

title: Detroit Three CEOs Face Congress Over Soaring Car Prices
description: For the first time since the 2008 financial crisis, the chiefs of Ford, General Motors and Stellantis will testify together before Congress. Ford’s Jim Farley, GM’s Mary Barra and Stellantis’ Antonio Filosa have been summoned by the Senate Commerce Committee for a 14 ...
titleSummary: Automakers' Big Wigs Confront Lawmakers Amid Growing Consumer Complaints Over Skyrocketing Vehicle Costs
descriptionSummary: For the first time in over a decade, the CEOs of America's Big Three automakers – Ford, General Motors, and Stellantis – will appear together before Congress to address pressing industry issues.

title: Hyundai Unveils The Crater Concept: A Playful Off-Roader With Serious Capability

titleSummary: Hyundai Rolls Out the Crater: A High-Spirited SUV that Delivers on Adventure
descriptionSummary: I recently had the chance to get an exclusive look at Hyundai's groundbreaking CRATER Concept at their Irvine design studio ahead of its LA Auto Show debut. The result is nothing short of breathtaking innovation.

According to Rolls-Royce, the one-off special is built for a wealthy individual who is passionate about vintage arcade ...
titleSummary: "Rolls-Royce Embodies 8-Bit Elegance in Limited-Edition Masterpiece Tribute"
descriptionSummary: Rolls-Royce pushes boundaries with its unique Ghost Gamer edition, a bespoke build inspired by vintage arcade culture. This rare creation meets the exacting standards of its discerning owner, a gaming enthusiast with a passion for retro technology.

title: Nissan Unveils All-New Navara Pickup for Australia and New Zealand
description: Nissan has revealed the next-generation Navara in Australia, marking one of the brand’s most important launches for the region in years. The all-new pickup has been engineered and tuned specifically for Australian and New Zealand conditions, combining a stronger chassis, a redesigned ...
titleSummary: Nissan Revs Up Down Under with Launch of All-New Navara Pickup Truck
descriptionSummary: Nissan's highly anticipated Navara has landed Down Under, boasting a robust new design tailored to tackle Australia's rugged terrain. Engineered locally, this next-generation pickup promises exceptional strength and capability.

title: Base Trim Lucid Gravity Debuts At LA Auto Show With A Friendlier Price Tag
description: Two years after the Lucid Gravity arrived on the Los Angeles Auto Show floor, the long-promised "affordable" version of the all-electric SUV is here. The Gravity website has promised a sub-$80,000 option for months, and it's now available. Announced Thursday at this year's LA Auto Show, the Bay ...
titleSummary: "Lucid's Most Affordable Model Unveiled at LA Auto Show with Surprising Pricing Slant"
descriptionSummary: After much anticipation, the affordable variant of Lucid's all-electric Gravity SUV has finally arrived. Priced under $80,000, this long-awaited model was unveiled at the 2023 LA Auto Show, marking a significant milestone in the brand's product lineup expansion.

description: The Hyundai Elantra N is one of the more accessible performance cars today. It delivers more-than-decent power and handling chops at a price that keeps it within reach. However, Hyundai took that up a notch earlier this year by introducing a special TCR Edition exclusively for Canada, marking the ...
titleSummary: Hyundai's Performance-Packed Elantra N Hits US Shores with a Bang
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's Elantra N offers thrilling performance without breaking the bank, making it an attractive option for driving enthusiasts on a budget. A new TCR Edition has also been introduced in Canada, elevating the model to new heights of style and capability.

title: Hyundai Crater Debuts Looking Ready to Eat Broncos and Wranglers for Breakfast
description: Hyundai has been building out its XRT line for a few years, gradually attaching a harder-edged personality to models like the Ioniq 5, Santa Cruz, and Palisade. The brand clearly sees momentum in this direction, because it isn’t stopping with simple accessory packs. The arrival of the Crater ...
titleSummary: "Rugged Hyundai SUV Roars into Town with Appetite for Off-Road Tussles"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's rugged XRT lineup is gaining traction, with bold designs emerging across models like the Ioniq 5 and Santa Cruz. Its latest iteration, the Hyundai Crater Rock, takes a significant step forward in this direction.

title: 2027 Kia Telluride Debuts With New Turbo Engine and First-Class Seating
description: Revealed earlier this month, Kia has officially debuted the 2027 Telluride at the 2025 Los Angeles Auto Show. While we’ve had a few days to get accustomed to the new look, Kia had not shared the technical specifications of the new crossover until now.  A lot has changed for the ...
titleSummary: "Kia Unveils Revamped Telluride with Powerful New Motor and Luxe Refinements Inside"
descriptionSummary: Kia unveiled its 2027 Telluride at the 2025 Los Angeles Auto Show, giving us our first glimpse of the revamped model. Now that the initial excitement has settled, Kia is sharing the detailed specs and innovations that set this new crossover apart.

title: The 2025 ID. Buzz Is Now One of VW’s Safest Vehicles
description: The 2025 Volkswagen ID. Buzz has secured a 5-Star overall safety rating from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), giving the electric people-carrier the highest score available under the agency’s New Car Assessment Program. The rating reflects strong ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Electric ID. Buzz Surpasses Safety Expectations for Model Year 2025
descriptionSummary: The 2025 Volkswagen ID. Buzz has earned a perfect 5-star safety rating from the NHTSA, the highest honor under its rigorous testing program. This accolade underscores the vehicle's exceptional crashworthiness and safety features.

title: The JDM Honda Odyssey Has Something the US Version Desperately Needs
description: It's no secret that there are two versions of the Honda Odyssey being sold right now. There's the North American version, and there's the one for most Asian markets. It's been that way for nearly 25 years since the second generation was introduced in 1999. Sliding doors are a must for US-market ...
titleSummary: "Honda's Japanese Market Odyssey Offers a Feature American Owners Have Been Missing"
descriptionSummary: The Honda Odyssey has long had a dual identity, with distinct models sold in North America and most Asian countries since its redesign in 1999. A key difference lies in their sliding doors, a feature more prevalent in international markets.

title: Exhaust Specialist Breaks Down Why the Lexus LFA Sounds So Iconic
description: There’s nothing within the automotive realm that can top the exhaust note of a Lexus LFA, unless it’s an early Formula One racecar. You can argue about the Porsche Carrera GT or any Cosworth V12 coming close, but the community wholeheartedly agrees that the LFA’s sound is something special. But ...

descriptionSummary: The Lexus LFA's exhaust note stands unrivaled in the automotive world, with some suggesting an early Formula One car might be its only match. Even the Porsche Carrera GT and Cosworth V12 fall short of capturing this unique sonic experience.

title: 2026 Toyota RAV4 Hybrid Prices Go Up—Should You Get a 2025 Model Instead?
description: The 2026 Toyota RAV4 is close to landing in showrooms, bringing a full redesign and a lineup built entirely around electrification. Toyota will offer two choices – a regular hybrid and a plug-in hybrid – effectively retiring pure gasoline versions in the process. Hybrid pricing is now public, ...
titleSummary: "Hybrid Hike: Is It Time to Swap for Last Year's RAV4?"
descriptionSummary: The revamped 2026 Toyota RAV4 is poised to hit dealerships soon, marking a significant shift towards electrification with a range of options, including a standard hybrid and a plug-in variant that render traditional gas-only models obsolete.

title: You May Soon Be Able to Unlock Your Cadillac With Your iPhone or Apple Watch
description: Owners of select Cadillac models may soon be able to go beyond the key fob, as digital keys within an iPhone or Apple Watch could soon be introduced to the luxury brand. descriptionSummary: Cadillac owners of certain models may soon enjoy a more seamless experience with their vehicles. Reports indicate that Apple is working on integrating digital car keys into iPhones and Apple Watches, bringing added convenience to luxury brand drivers.

title: 2026 Dodge Durango Gets Cheaper as V6 Returns
description: Little more than three months ago, Dodge was proud to announce that every single version of the Durango three-row SUV came with a V8 engine, with the base model doing away with the older Pentastar V6. The Durango is also the cheapest V8-powered SUV with all-wheel drive in the country. After all the ...
titleSummary: "Durango Drops Price with V6 Engine's Welcome Return to Lineup"
descriptionSummary: Dodge recently made headlines by equipping its entire lineup of three-row Durango SUVs with a robust V8 engine, replacing the older Pentastar V6 in the base model. This move makes the Durango the most affordable V8-powered all-wheel-drive SUV on the market.

title: Nissan Reports Fifth Straight Quarter of Losses Amid Restructuring
description: According to reports by The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg, Japanese automaker Nissan has announced a fifth straight quarterly net loss as U.S. tariffs proved a major speed bump for the company as it attempts to reorient itself. In an announcement on November 6, Tokyo time, Nissan reported a net ...
titleSummary: "Nissan Slides into Red for Fifth Consecutive Quarter Amid Deep Overhaul"
descriptionSummary: Japanese auto giant Nissan posted its fifth consecutive quarterly loss, hindered by US tariffs that have stymied its efforts to revamp operations and navigate a challenging market landscape, according to recent reports from The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg.

title: Ford Is Redesigning Dealers to Make Car Buying Feel Easier
description: As someone who has formerly worked in retail spaces, I learned firsthand how the setting in which a particular brand displays its products in its stores could make or break the shopping experience for both buyer and seller. This is the reason you see sales associates and other employees in clothing ...
titleSummary: Ford Overhauls Dealerships to Simplify and Streamline the Car-Buying Experience
descriptionSummary: Retail environments have a profound impact on consumer engagement and employee satisfaction. As someone with retail experience, I've witnessed firsthand how store layouts can either delight customers or hinder sales, affecting relationships between buyers and sellers.

description: A 2026 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3LZ has flipped for a massive profit after the original buyer purchased it for $220,745, trailered it home, never drove it, and later sold it for $290,000. The car, delivered in factory-fresh condition with just 5 miles showing, was immediately ...
titleSummary: "Corvette Enthusiast Scores Big with Rare 2026 ZR1 Sale for $70,000 Profit"
descriptionSummary: A rare 2026 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3LZ recently changed hands at a substantial gain after its original owner bought it new for nearly $220,750, drove it only briefly before selling it for a whopping $290,000 just a short time later.

title: Tesla Quietly Cut 400 Pounds From the New Model X — Here’s How
description: Due to regulations, safety systems, and the demand for more features, cars have gained a lot of weight dramatically. Add in bits for hybrid systems, and we regularly see cars tipping the scales at about 4,000 lbs. Okay, there are still compacts that weigh less than that, but we wouldn't exactly ...
titleSummary: Tesla Trims 400 Kilos From Luxe SUV, Rebooting It for Weightless Performance
descriptionSummary: Over the past few decades, vehicles have significantly expanded in size and heft due to stricter safety regulations, increased feature demands, and the integration of hybrid technology, often resulting in weights exceeding 4,000 pounds.
